entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h near noon. High 26. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Thursday 4 May 2023
